item.title: CVE-2011-1151|2024-08-06T22:14:28.056Z -- joomla%21 -- joomla%21
item.description: Joomla! 1.6.0 is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the filter_order and filer_order_Dir parameters.

item.title: CVE-2012-1563|2024-08-06T19:01:02.676Z -- joomla%21 -- joomla%21
item.description: Joomla! before 2.5.3 allows Admin Account Creation.
